title: 16 card White Sox t206 team lot plus coupon!

posts.post_title: 16 card White Sox t206 team lot plus coupon!
posts.post_content:
16 T206 white sox plus a cool 1909 Piedmont coupon. Looking for $225 delivered includes:
Walsh - pied 150
gandil - pied 350-460
duffy - pied 350-460
payne - sov 460
fiene - sc 350
hahn - pied 150
atz - pied 350
tannehil - sc 350-460
tannehill - pied 350-460
Sullivan - sc 350
sullivan - pied 150
donahue - pied 150
purtell - pied 350
isbell - pied 350
fiene port. sov - back damage
Dougherty port. GAI 1 ist graded back damage

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=49050&d=1320551690[/IMG]
Tried sending you a PM, but it said your box was full.  Sent you an email instead.  Let me know, thanks!
sorry just cleared my pms. looking for your email :)
To me? Or to someone else? I haven't received an email response.

Jason,

I replied to [url]jason@jasonstricker.com[/url] at 7 A.M .
I needed to cover what I paid for the items so your offer was too low. I got an offer to buy the cards after that from another board member. sorry fr the mixup,
sean :)
